doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 36 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/29/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 36 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/29/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Reagan administration issues a formal apology to medical researcher whose study of AIDS transmission by casual contact were misrepresented in a Justice Department memo2. Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation launches the 701 Club, a fundraiser to combat anti-gay groups3. Miami Yellow Pages now allows terms gay, lesbian, homosexual in adsCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. Jerry Falwell's newest phone number to prevent women getting abortions announced5. Andy Humm on the gay voting block and supporting pro-gay candidates above other political concernsCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp6. CDC separates AIDS-positive homosexual IV drug user statistics from those of drug-free homosexuals, creating a better perspective of the statistics7. Governor John Ashcroft of Missouri puts guidelines in place to protect persons with AIDS from discrimination in government employment8. Washington State tells Frito Lay they must obey anti-discrimination laws when doing business in the state9. California Secretary of State wins suit preventing Lyndon LaRouche group from supplying false information to voters on AIDS quarantine initiative10. Howard Stern advocating violence to "cure" gays, number announced for viewers to flood phone linesCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation11. Sports Report, footage from the 10th Annual Gay Softball World Series12. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with erotic performer, Casey Donovan, on proper condom use (repeat)13. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Coverage of San Francisco's "Closet Ball," with clips from the drag competitionCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Interview with hardcore porn director Christopher RageCOMMERCIAL: "Woman Talk" theater pieceCOMMERCIAL: Body Mate exercise equipment3. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 36 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 8/29/1986]: August 1986
